about_the_game:
All the cats are belong to us is a rogue-like monster-slaying RTS where you aim to survive the wilds and get back your cats.

In this game you will start off your quest with a small band of adventurers aiming to get back your precious cats. By slaying monsters and gathering experience, you will be able to upgrade your adventurers, gain more allies and, maybe, even gain a small foothold in the game world.

FEATURES


Three classes of units:

  • The Tank
  • The Healer
  • The Ranger

Gain experience and spend this on upgrading your adventurers or gain new adventurerers

Cats with special powers:
  • Cinnamon the fire kitten will launch an AOE attack which targets enemy creep and hits it with fire
  • Mr Grumbles the Buffoon will occasionally charge in a pack of enemies and stun them for a little bit
  • Shiva the sage will heal your adventures

name: All cats 'r belong to us

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

By slaying monsters and gathering experience, you will be able to upgrade your adventurers, gain more allies and, maybe, even gain a small foothold in the game world.
